UPDATE.LOG:
databases/pgpool-II-41: Update version 4.1.2=>4.1.6
- Pet portlint - Fix pkg-plist. Except the default pgpool.conf.sample other pgpool.conf.sample* represents different configurations for different scenario. Only the pgpool.conf.sample should create a corresponding pgpool.conf file. Hence removing the @sample directive for the other pgpool.conf.sample*
